label: AB2C4_tI14_139_a_e_ce-001
title: 0201 [(La,Ba)$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$] High-$T_{c}$ Structure
comments: The original ``high''-temperature (30K) superconductor found by Bednorz and Mueller. Lanthanum (92.5\%) and barium (7.5\%) atoms are distributed randomly on the lanthanum sublattice. The ground state structure of the parent compound, La$_{2}$CuO$_{4}$, is a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C4_oF28_69_a_g_cg-001}{face-centered orthorhombic}, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C4_oC28_64_a_f_ef-003}{base-centered orthorhombic}, or \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C4_mC28_8_2a_4a_4a2b-001}{base-centered monoclinic} distortion of this structure.
